system.description:
You are determined not to fall victim to the old adage that “those who cannot do, teach,” and have pushed yourself, refining both your athletic and martial skills and those you use when instructing others. You gain the following benefits:

  • Half your adept levels count as marshal levels for the purpose of the Rallying Surge feature and when you use it, the target gains temporary hit points equal to your martial arts die in addition to the healing granted. These temporary hit points last until the target begins a short or long rest.
  • When you use Mark Foe, the first ally to damage it before the start of your next turn deals additional damage equal to your martial arts die.
  • Half your marshal levels count as adept levels for the purpose of the Empty Mind feature.
  • Half your adept levels count as marshal levels for the purpose of the Spur Ally feature.
    Choose one of the combat traditions you have proficiency in from your adept levels. You can use that tradition with Combat Directives in addition to your Sanguine Knot maneuvers.
